p: Schiff bases have an extensive range of biological and medicinal properties, such as antimicrobial [12], antiinflammatory [13], antibacterial [14], antifungal [15], insecticidal [16], anticancer [17] antituberculosis [18], anticonvulsant [19], and antioxidant [20] activity. They are also used as pigments, catalysts, polymer stabilisers, and intermediates in organic synthesis [21].
